<OffenceSequenceNumber>003</OffenceSequenceNumber> <OffenceCode>PU86116</OffenceCode> <OffenceWording>On 01/09/2023 at ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2 you, with intent to cause VICTIM_1 harassment, alarm or distress, used threatening, abusive or insulting words or behaviour or disorderly behaviour, thereby causing that person or another harassment, alarm or distress </OffenceWording> <OffenceTiming> <OffenceDateCode>5</OffenceDateCode> <OffenceStart> <OffenceDateStartDate>2023-09-01</OffenceDateStartDate> </OffenceStart> </OffenceTiming> <ChargeDate>2023-11-22</ChargeDate> <ResultText>SUSPS - Suspended sentence order - imprisonment Committed to prison for 8 Weeks suspended. Reason: the offence(s) are so serious that only a custodial sentence can be justified. Reason for custody: behaviour caused significant distress to the two complainants. The defendant must comply with the requirements within the supervision period. In the event of activation of sentence: 0 bail remand days to count. Total custodial period 16 Weeks suspended for 18 Months.</ResultText> <Outcome> <Duration> <DurationValue>8</DurationValue> <DurationUnit>W</DurationUnit> <SecondaryDurationValue>18</SecondaryDurationValue> <SecondaryDurationUnit>M</SecondaryDurationUnit> </Duration> </Outcome> </Result> <Result> <ResultCode>3103</ResultCode> <ResultText>PR - Programme Programme Requirement: Participate in an accredited programme for 19 Days. Thinking skills</ResultText> </Result> <Result> <ResultCode>3272</ResultCode> <ResultText>RAR - Rehabilitation activity Rehabilitation Activity Requirement: Offender to comply with any instructions of the responsible officer to attend appointments (with the responsible officer or someone else nominated by them), or to participate in any activity as required by the responsible officer up to a maximum of 20 Days. </ResultText> </Result> <Result> <ResultCode>3012</ResultCode> <ResultText>FCOMP - Compensation To pay compensation of £250.00. </ResultText> <Outcome> <ResultAmountSterling>+250.00</ResultAmountSterling> </Outcome> </Result> <Result> <ResultText>GPTAC - Guilty plea taken into account Defendant's guilty plea taken into account when imposing sentence.</ResultText> </Result> <Result> <ResultText>NCOSTS - No order for costs No order for costs.</ResultText> </Result> <Result> <ResultText>NOVS - No surcharge Reason: Compensation takes priority</ResultText> </Result> <Result> <ResultText>COLLO - Collection order Collection order made. Make payments as ordered.</ResultText> </Result> <Result> <ResultText>PDATE - Pay by date Pay by date.
